description.title: Description
description.description: An optional longer description of what this attribute respresents in your system

key.title: Key
key.description: A URL-friendly name of the attribute (i.e: slug). You will be able to query later using this key instead of the id (UUID) of the attribute.

resource_id.title: Resource Id
resource_id.description: Unique id of the resource that the attribute belongs to.

resource_key.title: Resource Key
resource_key.description: A URL-friendly name of the resource (i.e: slug). You will be able to query later using this key instead of the id (UUID) of the resource.

organization_id.title: Organization Id
organization_id.description: Unique id of the organization that the attribute belongs to.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Unique id of the project that the attribute belongs to.

environment_id.title: Environment Id
environment_id.description: Unique id of the environment that the attribute belongs to.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Date and time when the attribute was created (ISO_8601 format).

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: Date and time when the attribute was last updated/modified (ISO_8601 format).

example.description: whether or not the github repository is private
